G

GameMaster - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing the game master of this tic-tac-toe program, the central class that provides access to all the methods necessary to run the system
GameMaster() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Creates a game master object
GameMaster(String) - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Creates a game master object given a string that represents its initial state (or configuration) of the board
getCol() - Method in class util.Coordinates
Returns the column-coordinate of this pair of coordinates
getCoor() - Method in class util.Evaluation
Returns the move evaluated by the agent
getEvalScore() - Method in class util.Evaluation
Returns the agent's numerical evaluation of the move
getIndex(int, int) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Returns the list index of a particular position
getIntelligence() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Returns the level of intelligence of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent (the rationality of the agent increases commensurate to the level number)
getIsAgentFirst() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Returns true if the tic-tac-toe-playing agent is the first to move; false, otherwise
getNumAgentWins() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Returns the number of times the tic-tac-toe-playing agent has won
getNumDraws() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Returns the number of times the game has ended in a draw
getNumHumanWins() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Returns the number of times the human player has won
getOccupiedC() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.Board
Returns a list of all the tiles currently occupied by the tic-tac-toe-playing agent (computer)
getOccupiedH() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.Board
Returns a list of all the tiles currently occupied by the human player
getPossibleMoves() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.Board
Returns a list of all the possible moves that a player can make given the current board state (or configuration)
getRandom(int) - Method in class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel0
Returns a random integer from 0 (inclusive) to the set upper bound (exclusive) for use in the random move generation of the level 0 agent
getRow() - Method in class util.Coordinates
Returns the row-coordinate of this pair of coordinates
gui - package gui
Provides classes for the graphical user interface of the tic-tac-toe game
